description: This file defines a React custom hook useChat for managing chat interactions, including message handling, loading states, health status, and suggestions, by making API calls to backend functions.

methods.name: useChat()
methods.description: A React custom hook that manages chat state, including message history, loading status, health, error messages, and suggestions. It preloads health and suggestions on mount and provides a function to send messages with optimistic UI updates and error handling.
